"I don't know if I can repair the ship... but it would be a good idea
to pa=
tch these holes, if not for security reasons, than just to keep
the weather=
 out...."

He had set up a rather crude smelting station and was trying to
=
recreate the panel of the ship that the hole was in.  He seemed to be
havin=
g trouble finding extra metal.
